snippet.title: LURKS WITHIN WALLS | Official Annoucement Teaser
snippet.description:
LURKS WITHIN WALLS is a tense survival horror game that combines the exploration elements of modern dungeon RPGs with fast-paced turn-based combat. Immerse yourself in a haunting atmosphere as you explore a series of cursed environments filled with terrifying creatures illustrated by the renowned artist Trevor Henderson.

A building under quarantine. Residents isolated. Those who failed to isolate themselves now stagger through the corridors, contaminated. But it's not just the infected residents—the darkness conceals other anomalies. It feels as if the building itself is alive.

Wishlist LURKS WITHIN WALLS on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3197890/LURKS_WITHIN_WALLS
